channel.title: How do I get ipban to work properly?
channel.description:
hi, I was just wondering how to get IP bans to work properly, because there are noobs that just annoy you and if you ban them they just make a new account, my Ip bans only ban all their acounts they made in the past, so that is no good, so how do I make it so it bans every name they try?
Manythanks James.

item.title: How do I get ipban to work properly?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

confusing? :rolleyes:[br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2007, 10:36:59 AM[/size][hr]so i cant use my client?

Well actually … It goes like this … Use the tokenizer to write a command/void that writes the name in a file and let the file block the IP adress … When he tries to connect …
